backend/main.mo: Defines core hotel booking canister types, storage maps, and authorization mixins for hotels, rooms, bookings, payments, users, and invite tokens.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, and test IDs for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of major frontend files including routing, auth guards, hotel management UI, and query hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color theme and dark mode variables with base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up favicon, metadata, root container, and main script.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Pre-release regression checklist covering auth, hotel browsing, hotel management, admin panel, and guest account flows.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring QueryClient, routing, auth guards, layout, and top-level providers.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports the deployment build version constant v31.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Displays all bookings in a table with status, totals, and a details dialog, fetching data via useGetBookings. Handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Lists hotels with controls to toggle active status and change subscription status, using mutation hooks and showing badges. Includes loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: Allows admins to generate invite tokens bound to a hotel principal and view/copy existing tokens. Validates principals and uses mutations with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access‑denied message with required roles and navigation options, optionally prompting hotel users to activate via HotelActivationForm. Handles admin‑only and activation-required cases.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Displays errors from permission checks with options to retry by invalidating queries or return home. Presents error details in a simple card layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Validates and consumes invite tokens to activate a hotel account, updating relevant queries and navigating on success. Provides feedback for validation, activation, and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Shows a modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter basic details and saves the profile via API.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Guards routes by requiring Internet Identity login and displays a login prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Checks user role, admin status, and optional hotel activation to grant or deny access, showing loading or error screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Dialog showing full booking details, with optional principal copy and payment proof indicators.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Form for creating room bookings, calculating nights and total price, validating inputs, and submitting via API.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Renders a badge with a label and style based on booking status.
frontend/src/components/booking/MyBookin: Displays the user's bookings in a table with status, pricing, and a details dialog.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Dialog for viewing a large preview of an image with a close button.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Displays authentication, role, and hotel-profile diagnostics with status indicators for debugging user access.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Shows a hotel's bookings in a table with status, totals, and a details dialog, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Lets hotels add and remove payment methods with form inputs, validation, and mutation-based updates.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Provides a form for hotels to edit profile info including name, location, address, map link, and contacts with validation.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Lists bookings past checkout and allows marking stays as completed via a mutation action.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Renders room photos with fallback handling, providing compact or full layouts and click-to-view interactions.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: Manages creation and editing of hotel rooms, including form handling, image uploads, and API mutations.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Displays hotel subscription status with badges and alerts, and shows admin contact instructions when inactive.
Provides the main app layout with top navigation, content area, and footer showing build info.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Renders a language dropdown allowing users to switch the UI locale, currently only English.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Navigation bar showing site links, auth actions, and conditional admin/hotel links based on user state.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Shows admin contact and payment details for hotel activation and subscription purposes only.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Lists hotel-specific payment methods and provides WhatsApp/email contact buttons for guests.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient configuration and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user roles, profiles, admin actions, and invite token validation via the backend actor. Integrates Internet Identity and actor state for query keys and permissions.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Implements a hook for uploading images by converting them to data URLs with simulated progress tracking. Returns upload status, overall progress, and helpers for processing data URLs.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Provides a locale context storing the current language in localStorage. Exposes a provider and hook to read and update the locale.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes. Sets global styling for background, foreground, and component colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Mounts the application with global CSS applied.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Displays the user’s authentication state, roles, hotel profile, and diagnostics, with tools to validate/consume invite tokens and refresh account data. Allows admins to elevate roles and navigate hotel access.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard containing invite token management, hotel visibility controls, and booking administration panels.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Shows a searchable list of hotels with representative room images and a preview dialog. Handles image fallback logic and navigation to hotel details.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Guest account dashboard displaying booking table and navigation to browse hotels or view account status.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Hotel management dashboard that loads hotel profile and shows tabs for profile, rooms, payments, bookings, stays, and subscription.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed hotel information, rooms, photos, and booking form based on hotel ID from the URL.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Main landing page letting users choose guest or hotel portal with role-based logic and authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookingsPage.tsx: Page showing user's bookings with quick navigation to browse hotels or view account status.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: Extended TypeScript definitions for backend models, enums, queries, and interface methods used across the app.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Utility enabling debug mode via development environment or URL parameter.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Utility functions for formatting money and validating supported currencies.
frontend/src/utils/roomPictures.ts: Utilities for validating, filtering, and tracking room picture URLs for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, known issues, and feature requirements for restoring validated hotel account behavior and hotel management UI.
